summary: Completed testing of Demo Data Seeding feature for ChiPi Link. All 18 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend PinPanClub Feed Block displays all seeded data correctly including matches, leaderboard, challenges, achievements, and tournaments.
passed_tests: GET /api/seed/demo-stats - returns correct structure (pinpanclub, users_wallets, memberships, notifications)
GET /api/seed/demo-stats - shows seeded data counts (12+ players, 30+ superpin matches, 20+ rapidpin matches, 4+ challenges, 4+ achievements, 1+ tournament)
POST /api/seed/demo-data - works with admin auth, returns success with results
POST /api/seed/demo-data - creates PinPanClub data (12 players, 12 rankings, 30 superpin, 20 rapidpin, 4 challenges, 1 tournament)
DELETE /api/seed/demo-data - works with admin auth, returns deleted counts
GET /api/pinpanclub/public/activity-feed - returns recent matches with player info
GET /api/pinpanclub/public/activity-feed - returns leaderboard with points and win/loss
GET /api/pinpanclub/public/activity-feed - returns active challenges with difficulty and points
GET /api/pinpanclub/public/activity-feed - returns recent achievements with player and rarity
GET /api/pinpanclub/public/activity-feed - returns stats (active_players, total_superpin_matches, total_rapidpin_matches, total_matches)
GET /api/pinpanclub/public/activity-feed - returns upcoming tournaments with status and participants
Full seed workflow integration test (seed → verify → delete → reseed)
frontend_tests_passed: PinPanClub Feed Block (data-testid='pinpanclub-feed-block') renders on landing page
Stats cards display: 12 Active Players, Super Pin count, Rapid Pin count, 50 Total matches
Recent Matches section shows match results with player avatars and scores (e.g., El Maestro vs Speedy 1-3)
Top Players leaderboard shows rankings with points (El Rayo 1500, El Maestro 1068, Phoenix 1010)
Active Challenges section shows 4 challenges with icons, difficulty badges, and point rewards
Recent Achievements section shows unlocked achievements with player names and rarity styling
Upcoming Tournaments section shows 'Torneo de Primavera 2026' with 8/16 participants
critical_code_review_comments: Seed script properly uses upsert operations to avoid duplicate data on re-seeding
Demo data includes realistic Spanish names and nicknames for players
Activity feed endpoint supports multi-language (es, en, zh) and configurable limits
Frontend PinPanClubFeedBlock has proper data-testid attribute for testing
All sections (matches, leaderboard, challenges, achievements, tournaments) display correctly
Stats cards use gradient backgrounds for visual appeal
context_for_next_testing_agent: Demo data seeding fully tested. Key endpoints: POST /api/seed/demo-data (admin auth required, creates all demo data), GET /api/seed/demo-stats (public, returns counts), DELETE /api/seed/demo-data (admin auth required, clears demo data). Public activity feed at GET /api/pinpanclub/public/activity-feed returns matches, leaderboard, challenges, achievements, stats, and tournaments. Frontend PinPanClubFeedBlock displays all data correctly on landing page. Admin login uses 'contrasena' field (Spanish) not 'password', and returns 'token' not 'access_token'.
